summary: Resolved conflicts in .pr-number (kept our PR #47), index.html (merged simple spaghetti website content with HTML5 best practices from main), and .claude-output.json (accepted deletion from main branch)
strategyUsed: Preserved our branch's intent (simple spaghetti website for issue #4) while incorporating HTML5 best practices from main branch (lang attribute, meta charset, viewport). Fixed typo 'spagheeti' to 'spaghetti'. Kept our PR number 47 as this is PR #47.

conflictResolution..pr-number: Kept our version (47) as this is PR #47
conflictResolution.index.html: Merged both versions: kept the simple spaghetti website content and theme from our branch, but incorporated HTML5 best practices from main (lang='en', meta charset, viewport). Fixed typo 'spagheeti' to 'spaghetti' for better presentation.
conflictResolution..claude-output.json: Accepted deletion from main branch - file was deleted by them and we agreed to remove it
